full_summary:
#Aviation Replacement Parts for CC138 Twin Otter
##Government Tender Announcement
###Reference Number: PW-22-01008765

**Procurement Overview**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified supply arrangement holders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter. This requirement aims to procure 5 items for the DND's Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP4.

**Solicitation Details**

* Solicitation Number: W8485-237307/A
* Publication Date: 2022-09-29
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-13 14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired

**Scope of Work**

The successful bidder will be required to provide aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter, including:

* Airframe Structural Components
* O-Ring
* Radar Equipment, Airborne
* Flight Instruments
* Automatic Pilot Mechanisms and Airborne Gyro Components

The tender description is identical to the original in French and English.

**Eligibility and Qualification**

Only qualified supply arrangement holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series are eligible to submit a proposal.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:

* Cole, June
* Email: june.cole@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-4320

The tender documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers.

**Announcement Status**

This tender announcement has expired.

**Government of Canada Disclaimer**

This announcement is made on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS). The Government of Canada is not responsible for the distribution of the tender documents.

###Tender Description

Tender documents for this project are not attached, but the tender details can be obtained from the below listed organizations.

###Important Notes

- Notice is given that continued opportunity for qualification will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once per year.
- To become a qualified supplier, please submit a request to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader at [samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Target Service Area**

The target service area for this project is:

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Alberta

 END OF ANNOUNCEMENT.  **This Announcement is now closed by Presentation.   Please
